subject: FACT FINDING OFFICE
body:
FACT FINDING OFFICE
INTERNATIONAL PAYMENT CENTRE,
152-160 CITY RD, LONDON EC1V 2NX,
UNITED KINGDOM
Attn: Deserving Beneficiary
This is a very good development as regards to the release of your long
awaited overdue payment of $15.5m. Be informed that  a seasoned
investor has volunteered to take up the project to sponsor the payment
process without you paying any upfront fee but he demands for 15% at
the end of the payment release.
The implication of this approval is that every short listed beneficiary
like you must travel to the assigned endorsement office in
person to sign the necessary fund release order documents/bond before
proceeding to the cash payment center for proper immediate payment release
without requesting for any upfront fees/charges.Respond urgently for
us to proceed
Note: The sponsor of this payment will take care of your all round trip.
Thanks for your kind understanding.
Yours Faithfully
Hon. Edward Hicks
Deputy Secretary
International Payment Center.

subject: Re:   FACT FINDING OFFICE
body:
Hello Hon. Edward Hicks,

Thank you for your message and the information provided. It's quite interesting to hear about this overdue payment and the involvement of a seasoned investor. I'm curious, could you please elaborate more on the project that the investor is sponsoring? 

Also, regarding the travel to the assigned office, could you kindly provide more details? Where is this office located? What kind of documents will I need to sign?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: FACT FINDING OFFICE
body:
Dear Mr. Williams,

Am writing to acknowledge receipt of your mail, which the contents have
been carefully noted down.First, It is very important for you to understand
that this very process is different from your previous dealings with the
corrupt officials and fraudster.

 This very project is100% genuine and not a child's play at all.  It is a
once in a life time opportunity for you to receive your long overdue
funds/payment in person without any upfront payment or hitch.

The sponsor of this project is a seasoned investor who will Carter and
cover every expenses/charges needed to complete this project, before the
final release of your funds payment. The investor is only demanding 15% of
your total long overdue funds payment worth US$15.5M, as his entitlement
for the sponsorship of this project.

It is purely legal and everything will be handled through a bank to bank
transaction, after you have concluded signing the Final Funds Release Order
Documents in one of the payment outlet in a country where payment center is
currently active.

You're not expected to pay any upfront fees like your previous dealings
with the scammers.  Be also informed that a good hospitality and adequate
security are guaranteed with proper medical arrangements in place, during
your trip to the payment outlet, until you received your funds payment and
return back to your country.

You are also advised to come with your proper medications if you're on
medical treatment.   Your feeding, hotel accommodation and other logistics
would be paid for in your favor once you indicate your readiness.

So, there is nothing else to worry about. Your travel is estimated to be
less than a 5 days trip. Taxi money will be provided too upon your arrival
and further money for expenses will be given to you too upon your arrival.

 In order for us to commence and proceed with the processing of your claim,
you are expected to reconfirm your details as requested
 below:

Your Full Name:
Contact Address:
Phone Number:
Nationality:
Scanned copies of your International Passport:

We await you to revert back to indicate your readiness.  Attached is my
official working ID for your perusal.

Yours Faithfully
Hon. Edward Hicks
International Payment Center.

subject: Re: FACT FINDING OFFICE
body:
Hello Hon. Edward Hicks,

Thank you for your detailed email and the reassurances you've provided. It's refreshing to hear that this process is different from my previous experiences, and I appreciate your understanding.

I'm intrigued by the project you mentioned, it sounds like a unique opportunity. Could you please provide more information about this project? What exactly does it entail?

Also, I would like to know more about the seasoned investor who is sponsoring this project. What kind of investments has he made in the past? 

You mentioned that there will be no upfront fees required from me, which is reassuring. However, could you clarify what expenses the investor will cover? Will they cover all costs related to travel and accommodation?

Lastly, could you provide more details about the payment outlet where I'll need to sign the Final Funds Release Order Documents? Where is it located?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: FACT FINDING------,MORE DEFAILED
body:
Attention. Mr. William,

Am in receipt of your mail and the contents well noted down. Like I stated
earlier, any shortlisted beneficiary must be present at the designated
payment outlets currently active in a country of Southern African, South
America or Asia, to sign all the relevant Payment Release Order Documents
in person for a very important reason.

Then, after signing all the relevant Payment Release Order Documents,
you'll be going to the country designated for the releasing of your funds
payment, to present the signed Payment Release Documents to the payment
release officials, with gift souvenirs to appease the payment release
officials in that country, to speedy up the release of your funds payment
to you without any hitch or delay.

You shouldn't be worried about anything concerning the conclusion of this
project,  because the Coordinator of this program will be the one to take
care of all your trip expenses to and fro, even back to your country, such
as your hotel accommodations, feeding, taxi and other logistics involved.

That is the reason why the investor contracted to sponsor this project is
entitled to take a certain percentage from your total funds payment after
you received your funds payment, for the  sponsorship of this project. Be
also assured that your security and good hospitality are also in place and
guaranteed.

I promise that you'll have a trip you'll ever live to remember throughout
your entire lifetime. Finally, you are advised to indicate your readiness
to visit any of the payment outlet to sign the payment release documents to
enable us commence action, as time is of essence in this project.

I await your earliest response !

Yours Sincerely,
Hon. Edward Hicks.
